players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: " I'm concerned about the sudden death of Diana and want to know more about Alice's alibi for last night."
Charlie: "I'm concerned about Bob's sudden interest in Alice's alibi and think he might be the mafioso. I suggest we investigate him."
You: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. My alibi is solid, so don't worry about me."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso, I have an alibi for last night. We should focus on finding out who really killed Diana."
